info.name: Moonbunny Cafe Dark Theme
info.additionalInfo: Version 1.0b - Made the search box border more visible. Version 1.0a - Fixed a line of text not changing colors. Version 1.0 - Released --- Note: The highlighting when selecting comics doesn't match with the rest of the style because I don't read the comics so I didn't bother with it, but if you want me to make it fit with the rest of the style I will. --- Let me know if the are any problems and I'll try to fix them.
